text: Kin thurchi misîr chu mahi ani, Pathien'n khrista5:19: Pathien'n miriem murdi khrista jârin ruolin a sina; aninônchu Pathien chu Khrista han munisi jât murdi a malngeiin a sin zoi. jârin munisingei murdi a ruolngeiin a minchang zoi. Pathien'n an sietnangei hah mindon pe ngei khâi loiin, male kho angin mo a ruolngeiin a sin ngei chang thurchi hah, keini mi pêk ani zoi.
